Note the red dot in the figure, you can see that in the state C,$P_{C}=0.75\times10^{5}P_{a}$ and $V_{C}=4L$
Note the red dot in the figure, you can see that in the state D,$P_{D}=0.75\times10^{5}P_{a}$ and $V_{D}=3L$

Note the red line in the figure, from state C to state D, the volume becomes smaller, the gas does negative work externally, and the work size is the area enclosed by the red line, that is $W_{2}=P_{C}\cdot\Delta V=75J$
